communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of the current list by subject matter, of all records in the possession of the agency.

This was last requested in 2015 in 18985.


I further request a brief description of the records maintained under the following subject matters, along with a count of the number of records for each subject:
Bus engineering records and reports
Bus specifications, warranty and descriptive information
Correspondence and supporting documentation 
Descriptive information on specific equipment or component parts
General law subject and brief files
Indexed and finding aids for centrally stored records
Finding aids, indexes, or tracking systems 
Legal opinion or legal directive
Manual of procedures policies and standards
Operational policies procedures rules and regulations 
Reports 
Railroad car engineering records and reports 
Railroad car specifications, warranty and descriptive information

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

ALEXANDER RICCIO

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: FOIL logs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

A log of all requests for agency records under the Freedom of Information Law received since January 1, 2020.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

ALEXANDER RICCIO
